import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import Header from '../components/header' import FeatureCard from '../components/feature-card' import './home.css' import Table from './table' const Home = (props) => { const [person, setPerson] = useState({name: null, surname: null}); const [data, setData] = useState(null); const personChangeHandler = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setPerson(prevState => ({...prevState, [name]: value})); } // const addPerson = () => { // } React.useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPeson`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setData(data); }); }, []); return (
